page.title: 03LAW AND ORDER
page.content: For our section we are doing Law and Order.We will be doing about the Home- watch Scheme,The Police,The police band and a Civic Award Scheme that we are doing with the school. There are many roads involved in the { Homewatch Scheme}in our area.It involves keeping an eye on other houses in your street and watching for suspicious people. We spoke to Mrs Thompson the homewatch leader for the Edgewood Estate.She told us the police visit the leaders regularly to check that everything is alright. We went out to find out how many people have burglar alarms we asked 27 people out of these only 3 people had alarms and these had all been fitted recently, but we also found that alot of people also use dogs to guard their houses.
